glsa.title: Ventrilo: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in Ventrilo, allowing for a Denial of Service.

background.p: Ventrilo is a Voice over IP group communication server.

description.p: Luigi Auriemma reported a NULL pointer dereference in Ventrilo when processing packets with an invalid version number followed by another packet.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted packets to the server, resulting in a crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Ventrilo users should upgrade to the latest version:
